img.alt: Disc rolling horizontally is connected by a string to a descending block

problem.p: In the diagram, the block of mass \(2m\) descends as a uniform solid cylinder of mass \(m\) and radius \(r\) rolls without slipping along a horizontal table. The string connecting the cylinder and the block goes over a pulley, a uniform solid disc of mass \(m\) and radius \(r\). There is no slipping between the string and the pulley. Find the acceleration \(a\) of the block.
